line.name: B1 - B84
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/07/2014  8:01AM

B24 & B62 buses are detoured due to the closures of the Kosciuszko & Polaski Bridges.

Detour is as follows:

B24 Westbound: Via 48 St, right on 56 Rd, left on Review Av, left on Greenpoint Av Bridge, left on Humboldt St, left on Meeker Av, right on Kingsland Av and regular route.

B24 Eastbound: Via Kingsland Av, right on Greenpoint Av Bridge, right on Review Av, right on 56 Rd, left on 48 St and regular route.

B62 Westbound: Via Jackson Av, left on 21 St, left on 49 Av, right on 27 St, left on Borden Av, right on Starr St, right on Van Dam St, right on Greenpoint Av Bridge, left on Huron St, left on Manhattan Av and regular route.

B62 Eastbound: Via Manhattan Av, right on Greenpoint Av, left on review Av, left on Borden Av, right on 27 St, left on 49 Av, right on 21 St, right on Jackson Av and regular route.

Corresponding stops will be made along detoured route.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/07/2014  8:02AM

Bx1, Bx2 & BxM3 buses are detoured due to a water main break on Sedgwick Av between Ft Independence & Van Cortlandt Pk W.

Detour is as follows:

Bx1 Northbound: Via Sedgwick Av, right on Van Cortlandt Park W, left on Bailey Av, right on 231 St and regular route.

Bx1 Southbound: Via 231 St, left on Bailey Av, right on Van Cortlandt Park W, left on Sedgwick Av and regular route.

Bx2 Northbound: Via Sedgwick Av, right on Van Cortlandt Park W, left on Bailey Av, left on 238 St, left on Ft Independence Av, right on Sedgwick Av and regular route.

Bx2 Southbound: Via Sedgwick Av, left on Ft Independence Av, right on 238 St, right on Bailey Av, right on Van Cortlandt Park W, left on Sedgwick Av and regular route.

BxM3 Northbound: Via Sedgwick Av, left on Ft. Independence Av, right on 238 St, right on Bailey Av, left on Van Cortlandt Park S and regular route.

BxM3 Southbound: Via Van Cortlandt Park S, right on Bailey Av, left on 238 St, left on Ft Independence Av, right on Sedgwick Av and regular route.

Corresponding stops will be made along detoured route.



Planned Detour
Bx9, Bx12, Bx12SBS and Bx22 temporary bus stop change at Fordham Plaza

Until further notice

Due to construction, the northbound Bx9 and Bx22 bus
stop on Fordham Rd at 3 Av will be made on Fordham
Rd between Washington and 3 Avs.

Bx12 and Bx12SBS bus stops on Fordham Rd between
Webster and 3 Avs will be made on Fordham Rd at
Washington Av in both directions.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.text:

Detour is as follows:

Bx1 Southbound: Via 231 St, left on Bailey Av, right on Van Cortlandt Park W, left on Sedgwick Av and regular route.

Bx2 Northbound: Via Sedgwick Av, right on Van Cortlandt Park W, left on Bailey Av, left on 238 St, left on Ft Independence Av, right on Sedgwick Av and regular route.

Bx2 Southbound: Via Sedgwick Av, left on Ft Independence Av, right on 238 St, right on Bailey Av, right on Van Cortlandt Park W, left on Sedgwick Av and regular route.

BxM3 Northbound: Via Sedgwick Av, left on Ft. Independence Av, right on 238 St, right on Bailey Av, left on Van Cortlandt Park S and regular route.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/07/2014  8:02AM

M9 buses are detoured due to road work on Murray St.

Detour is as follows:

Southbound: Via Church St, left on Reade St, left on W Broadway, right on Chambers St, left on West St and then regular route.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
M4 buses - Temporary bus stop closure on Broadway and 122 St

Until further notice

Due to construction, customers are advised
to board southbound buses on Broadway
and 121 St.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:

Q18 Temporary bus stop bypass on 58 St at 39 Av

Until further notice

Due to construction, customers are advised to board
southbound buses on 58 St at Woodside Av.

The 7:41AM train from Oyster Bay due Hunterspoint Ave. at 8:55AM is cancelled due to equipment trouble. Customers will be accommodated by the 8:16AM from Oyster Bay due Long Island City 9:36AM.

The 7:13AM train from Oyster Bay due Long Island City at 8:34AM is operating 34 minutes late from Oyster Bay due to signal trouble west of Oyster Bay.

Service Change  Posted: 01/07/2014  7:27AM

The 8:06AM train from Jamaica due Oyster Bay at 9:03AM will be delayed up to 30 minutes due to signal trouble. Customers can take the 7:39AM from Penn to Ronkonkoma (departs Jamaica 8:01AM) and transfer at Mineola for bus service to Oyster Bay.

Delays  Posted: 01/07/2014  7:11AM

The Oyster Bay Branch is experiencing westbound delays up to 30 minutes due to signal trouble west of Oyster Bay. Crews are on scene and troubleshooting the problem.
